extends Object
implements MimeMessageSender
    MimeMessageSender which uses SMTP to send the message.
    Author:
    Communote team - http://communote.github.io/

      • testSettings

        public boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
        Description copied from interface: MimeMessageSender
        Test the new configuration for sending mime messages. Implementations can for example do a connection test. Exceptions should be caught and logged.
        Specified by:
        testSettings in interface MimeMessageSender
        Parameters:
        settings - the configuration to test
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is valid for this mime message sender implementation, false otherwise.

      • testSettings

        public boolean testSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings,
                            javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage testMessage)
        Description copied from interface: MimeMessageSender
        Test the new configuration for sending mime messages and send a test message. Exceptions should be caught and logged.
        Specified by:
        testSettings in interface MimeMessageSender
        Parameters:
        settings - the configuration to test
        testMessage - a test message to send. Can be null. In this case the method should behave like MimeMessageSender.testSettings(Map).
        Returns:
        true if the configuration is valid for this mime message sender implementation, false otherwise.

      • updateSettings

        public void updateSettings(Map<ApplicationPropertyMailing,String> settings)
        Description copied from interface: MimeMessageSender
        Update the configuration of this mime message sender so that it will be used in subsequent invocations of MimeMessageSender.send(MimeMessage). Implementations don't need to validate the settings.
        Specified by:
        updateSettings in interface MimeMessageSender
        Parameters:
        settings - the new settings
